Summary Note:
The RM met Laursen Olsen Petersen at a yacht party in Copenhagen. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Laursen Olsen Petersen is a 41 year old CEO from Denmark.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Laursen Olsen Petersen is currently divorced. His child is named Amanda.
Education Background:
Laursen finished secondary school at Frederikshavn Gymnasium in 2003.
Laursen finished his studies at Aarhus University in 2007.
Occupation History:
Laursen Olsen Petersen is a 41 year old CEO from Denmark. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Laursen Olsen Petersen began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at Genmab A/S in 2008, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at Genmab A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 2011 to 2014.
He spent 10 years working as a CEO at Genmab A/S, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1330000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 4785000 DKK.


Following the passing of his father, a successful Investment Banker, he received an inheritance of 14390000 DKK in 2005, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
